text: The Joker Is Wild is a 1957 American biographical musical drama movie directed by Charles Vidor and based on the biography of Joe E. Lewis by Art Cohn. It stars Frank Sinatra, Mitzi Gaynor, Jeanne Crain, Eddie Albert, Jackie Coogan, Beverly Garland, Barry Kelley and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It won an Academy Award in 1958. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:1957 musical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor
title: The Joker Is Wild
